features.title: Instant Reporting
features.description: Quickly report potholes, broken streetlights, or any public issue directly from your device.

features.title: Bill Payments
features.description: Securely pay municipal bills like property tax or water charges with a few taps.

features.title: Service Requests
features.description: Request services such as bulk waste pickup or tree trimming effortlessly.

features.title: Community Forum
features.description: Connect with neighbours, discuss local topics, and stay informed about community events.

features.title: Local Information
features.description: Access important local information, news, and emergency alerts in one place.

features.title: Track Progress
features.description: Monitor the status of your reports and requests in real-time.

testimonials.quote: Vigihood made reporting a fallen tree so easy! It was cleared within a day. Amazing!
testimonials.author: Sarah L., Green Valley Resident

testimonials.quote: Paying my local taxes through the app was a breeze. No more long queues!
testimonials.author: John B., Oakwood Citizen

testimonials.quote: I love how connected I feel to my community now. The forum is great for local updates.
testimonials.author: Maria P., Lakeside Neighbourhood
